introduction: 首尔，惠利正在收拾住了很久的出租公寓。她将自己和前男友穿过的情侣运动鞋挂在二手网站上转卖。然而，前男友志勋却前来购买这双鞋。Hyeri cleans up her flat in Seoul, where she has lived for quite some time. She finds a pair of shoes she used to wear as a couple item with her ex-boyfriend and chooses to sell them online. When a person arrives to buy the shoes, Hyeri is surprised to find it’s her ex-boyfriend, Jihoon.
